Package com.darlandi.carpoolingchallenge.services

Class JourneyService

java.lang.Object
com.darlandi.carpoolingchallenge.services.JourneyService
@Service public class JourneyService extends Object
Class to check, save, unregister... and some utils for journeys.

  • Constructor Details

    • JourneyService

      public JourneyService()

  • Method Details

    • register

      public void register(JourneyDataTransferObject journeyDTO) throws BadInputException, NoCarAvailableException
      Check if the journey introduced satisfy max and minimum people, and if it is not already saved in the Redis DB. If the journey is not found in the DB, then save it and try to find a car.
      Parameters:
      journeyDTO - JourneyDTO object.
      Throws:
      BadInputException
      NoCarAvailableException

    • dropOffGroup

      public void dropOffGroup(Long id) throws NoJourneyFoundException, NoCarFoundException
      Free the car associated with the journey and remove the journey from the DB.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the journey.
      Throws:
      NoJourneyFoundException
      NoCarFoundException

    • checkWaitingJourneys

      public void checkWaitingJourneys()
      Check the first waiting journey and try to find a car for it. Keep the order of arrival, but if there is no car available, add a waiting weight to that journey and try to check the next waiting journey in the list.

    • getJourneyCar

      public Optional<CarDataTransferObject> getJourneyCar(Long journeyId) throws NoJourneyFoundException
      Get the car object associated with the journeyId.
      Parameters:
      journeyId - ID of the journey to search.
      Returns:
      Optional CarDataTransferObject.
      Throws:
      NoJourneyFoundException

    • journeyWaiting

      public void journeyWaiting(Long journeyId) throws NoCarAvailableException
      Check if the given ID journey is waiting for a car
      Parameters:
      journeyId - ID of the journey
      Throws:
      NoCarAvailableException - If there is no car assigned to the journey
